source.2b16cb9b:
import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import plotly.express as px
import seaborn as sns
%matplotlib inline
import matplotlib as mpl
mpl.rcParams['figure.dpi'] = 100

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")


import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))
source.02e2f3e1:
TopProduction = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopProductionMethods.csv")
TopDistributors = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopDistributors.csv")
TopGenres = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopGenres.csv")
PopularTypes = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/PopularCreativeTypes.csv")
TopGrossingRatings = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopGrossingRatings.csv")
TopGrossingSources = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopGrossingSources.csv")
HighestGrossers =  pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/HighestGrossers.csv")
AnnualTicketSales = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/AnnualTicketSales.csv")
WideReleasesCount = pd.read_csv("/kaggle/input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/WideReleasesCount.csv")
source.439a137e: # Lets first clean and prepare all the data
source.023e3f8b:
TopProduction['MARKET SHARE'] = TopProduction['MARKET SHARE'].str.replace('%','').astype('float64')
remove = ['TOTAL GROSS', 'AVERAGE GROSS','MOVIES']
TopProduction[remove] = TopProduction[remove].replace({'\$': '', ',': ''}, regex=True)
TopProduction[remove] = TopProduction[remove].astype('float64')
source.567a4a69:
TopDistributors['MARKET SHARE'] = TopDistributors['MARKET SHARE'].str.replace('%','').astype('float64')
remove = ['TOTAL GROSS', 'AVERAGE GROSS']
TopDistributors[remove] = TopDistributors[remove].replace({'\$':'',',':''}, regex = True)
TopDistributors[remove] = TopDistributors[remove].astype('float64')
source.c596adbb:
TopGenres['MOVIES'] = TopGenres['MOVIES'].str.replace(',','').astype('int64')
TopGenres['MARKET SHARE'] = TopGenres['MARKET SHARE'].str.replace('%','').astype('float64')
remove = ['TOTAL GROSS', 'AVERAGE GROSS']
TopGenres[remove] = TopGenres[remove].replace({'\$':'', ',':''}, regex = True)
TopGenres[remove] = TopGenres[remove].astype('float64')
source.d9028a1c:
PopularTypes['MOVIES'] = PopularTypes['MOVIES'].str.replace(',','').astype('int64')
PopularTypes['MARKET SHARE'] = PopularTypes['MARKET SHARE'].str.replace('%','').astype('float64')
remove = ['TOTAL GROSS', 'AVERAGE GROSS']
PopularTypes[remove] = PopularTypes[remove].replace({'\$':'', ',':''}, regex = True)
PopularTypes[remove] = PopularTypes[remove].astype('float64')
source.2687fea3:
TopGrossingRatings['MOVIES'] = TopGrossingRatings['MOVIES'].str.replace(',','').astype('int64')
TopGrossingRatings['MARKET SHARE'] = TopGrossingRatings['MARKET SHARE'].str.replace('%','').astype('float64')
remove = ['TOTAL GROSS', 'AVERAGE GROSS']
TopGrossingRatings[remove] = TopGrossingRatings[remove].replace({'\$':'', ',':''}, regex = True)
TopGrossingRatings[remove] = TopGrossingRatings[remove].astype('float64')
source.e70c4db4:
TopGrossingSources['MOVIES'] = TopGrossingSources['MOVIES'].str.replace(',','').astype('int64')
TopGrossingSources['MARKET SHARE'] = TopGrossingSources['MARKET SHARE'].str.replace('%','').astype('float64')
remove = ['TOTAL GROSS', 'AVERAGE GROSS']
TopGrossingSources[remove] = TopGrossingSources[remove].replace({'\$':'', ',':''}, regex = True)
TopGrossingSources[remove] = TopGrossingSources[remove].astype('float64')
source.47aab129:
HighestGrossers['TICKETS SOLD'] = HighestGrossers['TICKETS SOLD'].str.replace(',','').astype('int64')
remove = ['TOTAL FOR YEAR', 'TOTAL IN 2019 DOLLARS']
HighestGrossers[remove] = HighestGrossers[remove].replace({'\$':'', ',':''}, regex = True)
HighestGrossers[remove] = HighestGrossers[remove].astype('float64')
source.1a16c1c3:
AnnualTicketSales['TICKETS SOLD'] = AnnualTicketSales['TICKETS SOLD'].str.replace(',','').astype('int64')
remove = ['TOTAL BOX OFFICE', 'TOTAL INFLATION ADJUSTED BOX OFFICE', 'AVERAGE TICKET PRICE']
AnnualTicketSales[remove] = AnnualTicketSales[remove].replace({'\$':'', ',':''}, regex = True)
AnnualTicketSales[remove] = AnnualTicketSales[remove].astype('float64')
source.26182be7: # Now that we have cleaned the datasets, we can dive into some Exploratory Data Analysis

fig.show()

fig.show()

fig.show()
source.d763d663:

sns.barplot(x = 'MOVIES', y = 'DISTRIBUTORS', data = TopDistributors, order=TopDistributors.sort_values('MOVIES', ascending = False).DISTRIBUTORS)
plt.show()

fig.show()
